title: Valence Security Alert Insights
description: This dashboard provides visibility into SaaS security risks, including suspicious activity, misconfigurations, identity threats, and data exposure across cloud applications.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a centralized view of Valence Security alerts, enabling security teams to monitor, investigate, and analyze alert activity. It includes visualizations for alert trends, alert distribution by severity and type, action distribution by type, top alerts and actors, and associated client IP and geolocation data.

For more information, see the [Valence Security integration documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/valence_security/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the displayed time range.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
This group provides a high-level overview of alerts, alert trends, distributions by severity, and detailed alert logs.

This group offers insights into alert activity, covering alert types, top alerts and actors, alert status trends, key actions, MITRE ATT&CK tactics and techniques, and associated client IP and geolocation data.

definition.title: Top actor types associated with alerts
